page.title: 08WOODLAND IN THE AREA
page.content: The largest area of{woodland}is on the{Boconnoc Estate.}This area is managed by a{Head Forester}and{two {Forestry workers.}There is a mixture of{hard wood}and{soft wood}on the estate, which is sold for a variety of uses. Much is used for{fencing posts and as{pulp wood. }Some is sold to the {South Crofty Tin Mine}at Camborne for {pit props. As areas are cut so {re-aforestation}takes place,this maintains the productivity of the woodland and also provides{cover}for the{game birds}which are reared on the estate. It also however provides cover for various{preditors,}particularly foxes. At several points along the woodland tracks are old{water troughs which were used to water horses years ago.
